Package it.polimi.ingsw.is25am22new.Client.Commands.CommandList.ShipBuildingPhaseCommands

package it.polimi.ingsw.is25am22new.Client.Commands.CommandList.ShipBuildingPhaseCommands
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    DiscardComponentTileCommand
    Represents a command that discards the component tile currently held by a player.
    FinishBuildingCommand
    The FinishBuildingCommand class represents a command issued by a player to indicate that they have completed their shipboard construction during the BUILDING or CORRECTINGSHIP phases of the game.
    FlipHourglassCommand
    The FlipHourglassCommand class represents a command to flip the hourglass in the game.
    PickCoveredTileCommand
    Represents a command for a player to pick a covered tile during the building phase of the game.
    PickStandByComponentTileCommand
    The PickStandByComponentTileCommand class represents a specific command that allows a player to pick a standby component tile during the game.
    PickUncoveredTileCommand
    Represents a command in the game for picking an uncovered tile during the building phase.
    ShowPileCommand
    The ShowPileCommand class represents a concrete implementation of the AbstractCommand for displaying a specific card pile in the game interface.
    ShowRemainingSecondsCommand
    The ShowRemainingSecondsCommand class represents a specific command within the game to display the remaining time for the current phase to the user interface.
    ShowStandByComponentTilesCommand
    Represents a command to display standby component tiles on a shipboard during the BUILDING phase of the game.
    ShowUncoveredComponentTiles
    The ShowUncoveredComponentTiles command is responsible for visualizing the uncovered component tiles during the BUILDING phase of the game.
    StandByComponentTileCommand
    StandByComponentTileCommand is responsible for invoking the action of placing a component tile into the standby area of the shipboard during the BUILDING phase of the game.
    WeldComponentTileCommand
    The WeldComponentTileCommand class represents a command responsible for performing the action of welding a component tile onto the player's shipboard in the game.
